subject: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn: Rebecca,

My name is Yemi Cardoso.  I am the new  governor of Central Bank of
Nigeria.  While going through beneficiaries'/contractors' files
yesterday, I came across your own file and discovered that the major
reason why you have not received your fund for the past years is
because you are not the real contractor who executed this contract.
And if you continue to fight to receive this fund it will be
impossible for you to get it.

Based on that fact, I want you and I to strike a deal so that if you
are ready to receive the fund, I will guide you on the necessary
things to be done so that you will receive this fund.  If you keep
trying on your own to claim this fund they will need you to get the
vital documents from the original contractor that backs up this fund.
But I want to make it much easier for you if you can accept to work
with me so that I will make it possible for you to receive this fund.

The total amount in question is USD$26.5M.  So if you are ready to
work with me, I need you to provide your full information to me such
as your full names, address, phone and any of your identification
card.  On receipt of those information from you, I will tell you the
next step.

Please you should be informed that I will provide all the necessary
documents that will back up this fund so that after you receive this
fund there will be no agency that will question you about the source
of this fund.  I also want to ask you if you can be able to come down
here to sign all those documents.  But if you know you cannot be able
to come down here to sign the documents, a competent lawyer here will
sign  those documents on your behalf and the lawyer will charge the
sum of $350 for him to sign those documents for you which you will be
the person to pay this fee because you will be required to send a copy
of the receipt of payment of this $350.  That is the only fee you will
pay and nothing again to pay before you receive this fund.

Please note that this is a deal between you and I and I want you to
cooperate with me.

Please you should reply this to this email address: cardosoyemi6@gmail.com

You can also call me on the phone number: +234-9165637153.

I look forward to hearing from you.


Yemi Cardoso
New Central Bank Governor.

E-mail: cardosoyemi6@gmail.com

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing! It's not every day that one gets a message from the governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria.

I'm curious about this whole situation. How did you come across my file? And why was it mixed up with a contractor's file? 

Also, could you please clarify what kind of deal you're proposing? I'm not sure I fully understand what you're suggesting.

Looking forward to hearing more about this!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing. It's not every day that one gets a message from the governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria!

I'm curious about this contract you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? What was the nature of this contract and why was my name associated with it?

Also, I would like to understand better how you plan to make it easier for me to receive this fund. You mentioned some vital documents from the original contractor - could you elaborate on what these documents are?

I appreciate your offer to help and look forward to hearing more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing! It's not every day that one gets a message from the governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria.

I'm curious about this contract you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? What kind of contract was it and why was my name associated with it?

Also, I would like to know more about these vital documents that are needed from the original contractor. What exactly are these documents and why are they so important?

You mentioned a sum in USD but didn't specify the amount. Could you clarify how much we're talking about here?

Lastly, regarding the lawyer's fee, could you tell me more about this lawyer? Is he or she affiliated with your bank or an independent practitioner?

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:

You mentioned a contract that was executed, could you please provide more details about this contract? What was the nature of the work involved in it?

Also, you mentioned a sum of USD but didn't specify the amount. Could you clarify how much we are talking about here?

I appreciate your offer to guide me through the process and provide necessary documents. However, I'm not sure if I can travel at the moment due to personal reasons. You mentioned a lawyer who could sign on my behalf, could you tell me more about him? Is he someone from your team or an independent professional?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn:: Rebecca,

I read your emails and its contents were well noted and understood.
In my first proposal to you I mentioned to you that I am the newly
appointed governor of Central bank of Nigeria.  On resumption of
office I found this total sum of USD$26.5M  which no one has any claim
to it.  So I saw your file bearing your name and decided that I will
use your name to prepare all the documents that will back up this
fund.

So I want you and I to have this as  a deal so that i will get those
documents in your own name.

Can you come down here to sign those documents that cover this fund?
if you cannot come to sign them there is our bank lawyer here who will
sign the documents on your behalf and you will have to pay the sum  of
$350 so that the lawyer will sign them for you.

I will also nee you to confirm your full information to you such as
your full names, address, phone and any form of your identification
card.

I wait to hear from you.

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information. It's quite an interesting proposal you have there. I'm curious, how did my name come up in your files? Also, could you please explain a bit more about these documents that need to be signed? What exactly do they entail?

As for coming down to sign the documents, I'm afraid that might not be possible at the moment due to my current circumstances. However, I'd like to know more about this bank lawyer who can sign on my behalf. What is their name and what kind of experience do they have?

Regarding the payment for the lawyer's services, could you provide more details on how this process works? Is there a specific method of payment required?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn: Rebecca,

I told you that I am a new central bank governor and I know everything
about this fund just like any other person can do. it is a deal I want
both of us to strike and as the governor, I do not want my name to
appear on the documents.  I want to use your full information to get
those documents that will back up the fund.

The name on the fund has a similar name to yours and that is why I
want to get those documents in your own name.  So you should not
bother about that.  I will make it in such a way that there will be
nothing to suspect about this fund.

I need you to provide me with your full information such as your full
names, address, phone and any of your identification card.

I prefer that you send the $350 for the lawyer's fee by World Remit or
Ria for security reasons.

The lawyer's name is Barr. Christopher Adams.

If you reply this email I will give you the payment information where
you will send the fee.

I would want us to talk on the phone.  Here is my phone number:
+234-9165637153.  You can call me or you provide a number with which I
can reach you.

Waiting to hear from you.

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation. It sounds like an interesting opportunity, but I must admit, I'm not entirely clear on all the details. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about this fund and how it works? 

Also, I'm curious about Barr. Adams. What is his role in this process? And why do we need to pay a lawyer's fee?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but as you can imagine, this is quite new to me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn: Rebecca,

It is because you cannot come down here to sign those documents by
yourself and that is why the lawyer is involved.  He is going to sign
those documents that will back up this fund on your behalf and that is
why you  are paying him $350 as his signing fee.

Please note that the lawyer is not one of us as partners.  His duty is
to sign those documents and after doing that he will find his way  So
you should not get bothered about that.

I also need you to confirm those your information that I requested for
as I will use them to get those documents that will back up this fund.
I also need your phone number and if you cannot call, I will call you.

I am waiting to hear from you

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's interesting to know how the process works and the role of the lawyer in this. I'm curious, what kind of documents are these that require a lawyer's signature? 

As for my details, I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing them over email. Is there another way we can proceed without me providing my personal information?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn: Rebecca,

Since you do not want to release your information how do you want to
receive the fund and what names do we use to appear on the documents
since you do not want to confirm your information to me.

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn: Rebecca,

I asked again how do you intend to receive this fund since you do not
want to disclose your information to me.  Is that how you want to do
the deal with me in order to claim this fund without me having your
information to prepare those documents.

I wait to hear from you

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn;: Rebecca,

You do not seem to be serious about the whole process.  You keep
repeating the same words again.

If you are serious to work with me you should do what I advised you to
do..  How can you tell me you do not want to release your information.
That makes me to begin to doubt if you are just a joker.

How then do I get those information that will cover this fund if you
do not release your information to me.

You should try to show some seriousness in this transaction.  I do not
want us to be wasting time unnecessarily

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your concern and understand where you're coming from. However, I believe there might be a misunderstanding here.

I am indeed serious about the process and want to ensure everything goes smoothly. Could you please clarify what exactly it is that you need from me? I'm more than willing to cooperate as long as it doesn't involve sharing any personal information.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Attn: Rebecca,

I need your phone number.  i want to talk to you on the phone first..
It is very important.

Yemi

subject: Re: RE: ATTN: Rebecca
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm always open to a good chat, but I prefer to keep our conversation here for now. Is there something specific you wanted to discuss?

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Attn: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn: Sir/Madam,
My name is Yemi Cardoso.  I am the new  governor of Central Bank of
Nigeria.  While going through beneficiaries'/contractors' files
yesterday, I came across your own file and discovered that the major
reason why you have not received your fund for the past years is
because you are not the real contractor who executed this contract.
And if you continue to fight to receive this fund it will be
impossible for you to get it.
Based on that fact, I want you and I to strike a deal so that if you
are ready to receive the fund, I will guide you on the necessary
things to be done so that you will receive this fund.  If you keep
trying on your own to claim this fund they will need you to get the
vital documents from the original contractor that backs up this fund.
But I want to make it much easier for you if you can accept to work
with me so that I will make it possible for you to receive this fund.
The total amount in question is USD$26.5M.  So if you are ready to
work with me, I need you to provide your full information to me such
as your full names, address, phone and any of your identification
card.  On receipt of those information from you, I will tell you the
next step.
a
Please you should be informed that I will provide all the necessary
documents that will back up this fund so that after you receive this
fund there will be no agency that will question you about the source
of this fund.  I also want to ask you if you can be able to come down
here to sign all those documents.  But if you know you cannot be able
to come down here to sign the documents, a competent lawyer here will
sign  those documents on your behalf and the lawyer will charge the
sum of $350 for him to sign those documents for you which you will be
the person to pay this fee because you will be required to send a copy
of the receipt of payment of this $350.  That is the only fee you will
pay and nothing again to pay before you receive this fund.
Please note that this is a deal between you and I and I want you to
cooperate with me.
Please you should reply this to this email address: 
cardosoyemi6@gmail.com
You can also call me on the phone number: +234-9165637153.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Yemi Cardoso
New Central Bank Governor.
E-mail: 
cardosoyemi6@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Attn: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Yemi Cardoso, thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Can you please provide more details on how we can proceed with receiving the fund? What are the necessary steps that need to be taken next?

Best wishes,
Yvette

subject: Re: Attn: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn: Yvettte,

Before  we proceed please kindly confirm your full information to me
such as your full names, address, phone and any means of your

Yemi

subject: Re: Attn: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to provide you with the information you need. What specifically do you require my full name, address, phone number, and card details for? Let me know how I can assist you further.

Best wishes,
Yvette

subject: Re: Attn: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn: Yvette,

Yes, I need your full names, address, phone and any of your ID Card.

body:

Best wishes,
Yvette
